description:
When running the unittests via tox the following warning appears several times at the top

nova/bin/nova-manage:84: RuntimeWarning: Parent module 'nova_manage' not found while handling absolute import
  from nova.db import migration
title: Warning during unittesting - RuntimeWarning: Parent module 'nova_manage' not found
